channel.title: Cyberattaques | Casualtek
channel.description: Flux RSS de suivi, en Français, des cyberattaques rapportées dans la presse internationale. Maintenu par Valéry Rieß-Marchive (LeMagIT).

item.title: Ville de Middletown (USA) autour du 17 août 2025.
item.description: La ville de Middletown est victime d'une faille de sécurité informatique qui a perturbé de nombreuses fonctions de la ville. Les services en personne sont suspendus au bâtiment de la ville de Middletown, mais les autres départements continuent de fonctionner normalement. La ville fournira des mises à jour supplémentaires sur la situation.

item.title: Welcome Financial Group (KOR) autour du 11 août 2025.
item.description: Un groupe russe a revendiqué une attaque par ransomware contre Welrix I&F, une filiale de Welcome Financial Group, et a affirmé avoir acquis la base de données des clients. L'entreprise a alerté les autorités de cybersécurité et les autorités financières. L'attaque est la dernière d'une série de cyberattaques contre des entreprises sud-coréennes.

item.title: Ratio Architects LLC. (USA) autour du 06 octobre 2024.
item.description: Ratio Architects, LLC suffered a data security incident involving the unauthorized acquisition of personal information, including names and other data elements. The incident occurred on October 6, 2024, and was discovered on May 23, 2025. The company has taken steps to resecure its systems and is providing identity monitoring services to affected individuals.

item.title: Dinowitz & Bove CPA (USA) autour du 19 juillet 2024.
item.description: Dinowitz & Bove CPA experienced a data security incident that may have affected personally identifiable information. The incident occurred on July 19, 2024, and was discovered on July 8, 2025. The breach involved the potential unauthorized access to names and other information.

item.title: City of Lubbock (USA) autour du 12 août 2025.
item.description: La ville de Lubbock a subi deux attaques informatiques cette année, dont une qui a fermé sa présence en ligne. Une attaque antérieure avait créé une fausse fenêtre contextuelle sur le site de paiement des services publics de la ville. Les autorités de la ville ont travaillé pour restaurer les systèmes et ont offert une période de surveillance du crédit gratuite aux personnes touchées.

item.title: Inotiv, Inc. (USA) autour du 08 août 2025.
item.description: Inotiv, Inc. a subi une faille de sécurité informatique le 8 août 2025, une enquête est en cours pour déterminer l'ampleur de l'incident. L'entreprise a pris des mesures pour contenir et remédier à la situation, mais les opérations commerciales ont été perturbées. L'incident a eu un impact temporaire sur la disponibilité et l'accès à certains réseaux et systèmes de l'entreprise.

item.title: Christian Brothers Academy (USA) autour du 30 mai 2025.
item.description: Christian Brothers Academy suffered a cyberattack that may have exposed personal information, including names, addresses, financial information, and identification numbers. The breach occurred through a potential phishing attack, and the attackers may have accessed certain files containing personal information. The attack was claimed by Interlock on June 12th.

item.title: Continental Bancorporation (USA) autour du 10 avril 2025.
item.description: An unauthorized party attempted to gain access to Continental's internal network via a recently published vulnerability associated with CrushFTP server software, potentially accessing personal information of one New Hampshire resident.

item.title: Columbia University (USA) autour du 24 juin 2025.
item.description: Columbia University experienced a cyber incident where an unauthorized third-party gained access to their network and took certain files from their system. The affected data included names, dates of birth, Social Security numbers, and personal information. The university is offering two years of complimentary credit monitoring and identity restoration services through Kroll.

item.title: CEI Vision Partners, LLC (USA) autour du 26 mai 2024.
item.description: CEI Vision Partners, LLC discovered a data breach after an unknown, unauthorized third party gained temporary access to their computer network between May 24, 2024, and May 27, 2024. The breach may have involved personal information, including names, contact information, dates of birth, Social Security numbers, financial account information, limited clinical information, and/or health plan information. The organization is offering a complimentary one-year membership of Experian IdentityWorksSM Credit 3B to affected individuals.

item.title: Lumitex, Inc. (USA) autour du 30 juillet 2025.
item.description: The breach details are unclear, but it appears to be a complex incident involving multiple entities and potential data exposure. The exact nature and scope of the breach are unknown. Further investigation is required to determine the full extent of the incident.

item.title: The Business Council of New York State, Inc. (USA) autour du 25 février 2025.
item.description: An unauthorized party gained access to BCNYS internal systems from February 24, 2025, to February 25, 2025, potentially exposing personal information. The breach was discovered on August 4, 2025. BCNYS is offering complimentary credit monitoring to affected individuals.

item.title: CPAP Medical Supplies and Services Inc. (USA) autour du 21 décembre 2024.
item.description: CPAP Medical Supplies and Services Inc. experienced a data breach, potentially exposing personal and medical information. The company is offering complimentary credit monitoring and recommends that affected individuals place a fraud alert on their credit files. Additional resources are provided for affected residents in various states.

item.title: Optima Tax Relief, LLC (USA) autour du 06 mai 2025.
item.description: Optima Tax Relief, LLC suffered a data breach between May 1, 2025, and May 6, 2025, resulting in unauthorized access to certain files containing personal information of five Maine residents. The attack was claimed by Chaos on June 6th.

item.title: Daniels Law Group, LLC (USA) autour du 09 juillet 2025.
item.description: An unidentified individual or group used illegal methods to gain unauthorized access to Daniels Law Group's file servers, potentially acquiring personal data belonging to clients and their family members. The incident occurred on or before July 1, 2025, and was discovered on July 9, 2025. It was claimed by Qilin on July 21st.

item.title: The Mercadien Group, LLC (USA) autour du 09 décembre 2024.
item.description: The Mercadien Group, LLC experienced a data security incident that may have affected personal information, including names, dates of birth, and Social Security numbers. The incident occurred on November 26th, 2024, and was discovered on December 9, 2024. The organization is offering complimentary credit monitoring and fraud assistance services to affected individuals.

item.title: Lands' End, Inc. (USA) autour du 06 décembre 2024.
item.description: Lands ' End experienced a data security incident where an unauthorized third party accessed a small portion of its corporate network, potentially exposing personal information of current and former employees and their dependents.

item.title: Manpower of Lansing, MI Inc. (USA) autour du 29 décembre 2024.
item.description: Manpower of Lansing MI, Inc. experienced an IT outage that led to unauthorized access to their network between December 29, 2024, and January 12, 2025. The attack was claimed by RansomHub on January 22nd.

item.title: Old Dutch Foods, Inc. (USA) autour du 17 octobre 2024.
item.description: Old Dutch Foods, Inc. suffered a data breach between October 16 and October 17, 2024, where unauthorized access occurred and sensitive information may have been copied and taken. The breach involved name, Social Security number, driver's license number, and financial account information. Old Dutch Foods, Inc. is offering complimentary credit monitoring and identity protection services through Experian.

item.title: DBM Global Inc. (USA) autour du 20 novembre 2024.
item.description: DBM Global, Inc. experienced a data security incident in November 2024, where an unknown actor acquired certain personal information without authorization. The incident was discovered on November 20, 2024, and DBM Global undertook a comprehensive review of the potentially impacted data. The company notified 12 Maine residents and offered complimentary credit monitoring and identity theft protection services.
